mapper.select: select tid, station_name, station_code, station_spell, station_szm, station_count, city_id, city_name, create_time, datachange_time from station_info where tid = #{tid}
mapper.insert: insert into station_info(station_name, station_code, station_spell, station_szm, station_count, city_id, city_name, create_time, datachange_time) values (#{stationName}, #{stationCode}, #{stationSpell}, #{stationSzm}, #{stationCount}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{createTime}, #{datachangeTime})

insert into station_info(station_name, station_code, station_spell, station_szm, station_count, city_id, city_name, create_time, datachange_time) values
(#{entity.stationName}, #{entity.stationCode}, #{entity.stationSpell}, #{entity.stationSzm}, #{entity.stationCount}, #{entity.cityId}, #{entity.cityName}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.datachangeTime})

insert into station_info(station_name, station_code, station_spell, station_szm, station_count, city_id, city_name, create_time, datachange_time) values
(#{entity.stationName}, #{entity.stationCode}, #{entity.stationSpell}, #{entity.stationSzm}, #{entity.stationCount}, #{entity.cityId}, #{entity.cityName}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.datachangeTime})
on duplicate key update station_name = values(station_name), station_code = values(station_code), station_spell = values(station_spell), station_szm = values(station_szm), station_count = values(station_count), city_id = values(city_id), city_name = values(city_name), create_time = values(create_time), datachange_time = values(datachange_time)
mapper.update:
update station_info
station_name = #{stationName},
station_code = #{stationCode},
station_spell = #{stationSpell},
station_szm = #{stationSzm},
station_count = #{stationCount},
city_id = #{cityId},
city_name = #{cityName},
create_time = #{createTime},
datachange_time = #{datachangeTime},
where tid = #{tid}
